name: shutdown
description: Shuts down the robot

name: clean
description: Deletes the last messages in the channel

params.name: amount
params.description: The amount of messages to remove

name: updateNames
description: Force update everyone's nicknames from the database

name: poll
description: Create a timed poll in the current channel

params.name: duration
params.description: The duration that the poll lasts

params.name: options
params.description: The options for the poll separated by commas

usage: poll 45m What is your favorite color?; Blue, Red, Green

name: kick
description: Kicks a user from the server

params.name: user
params.description: The user (as a mention) to kick from the server

name: mute
description: Mutes a user in the current channel (can no longer send messages)

params.name: user
params.description: The user (as a mention) to mute

name: unmute
description: Unmutes a user in the current channel (restores their message send access)

params.name: user
params.description: The user (as a mention) to unmute

name: hideChannel
description: Hides the current channel from everyone (except administrators)

name: play
description: Queues up a song to be played by the Auto DJ

params.name: query/url
params.description: The YouTube search query or URL to play

name: playAt
description: Adds a song to the queue at a given position

params.name: position
params.description: The position in the queue

params.name: query/url
params.description: The YouTube search query or URL to play

name: disconnect
description: Disconnects the DJ from its current voice channel and clears the queue

name: queue
description: Displays the current music queue

name: skip
description: Starts a vote to skip the currently playing song

name: dequeue
description: Removes a song from the queue

params.name: position
params.description: The position in the queue of the song to remove

name: volume
description: Adjusts the robot's volume level

params.name: volume
params.description: The volume to set. Append `+` or `-` to change the volume by that amount

name: move
description: Moves the provided song to a new position in the queue

params.name: song
params.description: The position in the queue of the song to move

params.name: position
params.description: The position to move the song to. Leave blank to move the song to the top of the queue

name: pause
description: Pauses the music

name: connect
description: Summons KirBot to your current voice channel

name: stats
description: Display statistics about the robot

name: clearance
description: Displays your current clearance level according to the bot

name: refresh
description: Refreshes data from the robot

params.name: item
params.description: The item to refresh

name: overwatch
description: Retrieves Overwatch statistics for the provided battle tag

params.name: battletag
params.description: The BattleTag of the user to lookup stats for

name: spamFilter
description: Temporarily disables the spam filter in the current channel

name: color
description: Changes your name's color

params.name: color
params.description: The hexadecimal color code of the color you wish to set, or "reset" to reset

name: permissions
description: Displays a list of all the permissions KirBot currently has

name: quote
description: Displays a quote taken by KirBot earlier

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of the quote

name: createGroup
description: Creates a group on this server

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the group to create

name: deleteGroup
description: Removes a group on this server

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the group to remove

name: leaveGroup
description: Leaves the given group

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the group to leave

name: joinGroup
description: Joins the named group

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the group to join

name: groups
description: Displays a list of all the groups currently on this server

name: su
description: Run KirBot commands as a different user

params.name: user
params.description: The Snowflake of the user to run the command as

params.name: command
params.description: The command to run

name: clearanceOverride
description: Change the clearance required to run commands

params.name: command
params.description: The command to modify

params.name: clearance
params.description: The clearance level to set, or "reset" to reset

name: seen
description: Displays last activity of a user

params.name: user
params.description: The user (as a mention) to display information for
